item.title: Databricks 人工智能主管将离职，创办一家新的计算机初创公司
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，市值1000亿美元的初创公司Databricks Inc.的人工智能主管纳文-拉奥（Naveen Rao）正计划离职，创办一家制造新型计算机的新企业。【原文：Naveen Rao, the head of artificial intelligence at the $100 billion startup Databricks Inc., is planning to leave his position to launch a new venture making a novel type of computer, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 黑石咖啡吧在美国首次公开募股中筹集 2.941 亿美元
item.description: 黑石咖啡吧公司（Black Rock Coffee Bar Inc.【原文：Black Rock Coffee Bar Inc., an operator of a drive-through-focused coffee chain, raised $294.1 million in a US initial public offering that priced above its marketed range.】

item.title: 美联储即将召开，ETF规模扩大，黄金周线上涨
item.description: 由于市场预期美联储将下调美国利率，黄金价格在金银支持的交易所交易基金资金流入和美元走软的推动下，实现了连续第四周上涨。【原文：Gold headed for a fourth weekly gain on expectations the Federal Reserve is poised to lower US interest rates, with prices aided by inflows into bullion-backed exchange traded funds and a weaker dollar.】

item.title: 日本武装部队首次发现中国最大航母
item.description: 日本自卫队周四在东海发现了中国最大、最先进的航空母舰，这是日本首次发现福建号航空母舰。【原文：China’s biggest and most advanced aircraft carrier was spotted in the East China Sea on Thursday by Japan’s Self-Defense Forces, marking the first time the Fujian was sighted by Japan.】

item.title: SK海力士发布人工智能内存里程碑消息，股价再创新高
item.description: SK Hynix 公司宣布已完成对人工智能工作至关重要的下一代高带宽内存 HBM4 的开发，该公司股价周五攀升 5.9%，创下历史新高。【原文：SK Hynix Inc.’s stock climbed as much as 5.9% on Friday to a record after the company announced it had completed development of HBM4, the next generation of high-bandwidth memory crucial for artificial intelligence work.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴股价飙升 8%，投资者买入人工智能大举措
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团本周采取了一系列旨在巩固其在中国人工智能发展热潮中地位的举措，其股价创下约两周来最大涨幅。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s stock gained the most in about two weeks after a series of moves this week aimed at shoring up its place in China’s AI development boom.】

item.title: 美日确认不会操纵外汇以获取竞争优势
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）和日本财务大臣加藤胜信（Katsunobu Kato）在一份联合声明中重申了他们的基本承诺，即让市场决定汇率，而不是以汇率为目标来获得竞争优势。【原文：US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and Japan Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato reaffirmed in a joint statement their basic commitment to let markets determine currency rates and not to target exchange rates to gain a competitive advantage.】

item.title: 中国债券下跌吸引全球大型基金重返市场
item.description: 全球投资者再次对中国政府债券趋之若鹜，在此之前，中国政府债券收益率已升至数月高点。【原文：Global investors are once again warming up to Chinese government bonds, after a selloff driven by a rotation into stocks sent yields to multi-month highs.】

item.title: 美国 CPI 印证降息观点，日本股市连续第三日上涨
item.description: 在美国通胀数据巩固了美联储下周将在今年首次降息的预期之后，日本股市连续第三天上涨，市场情绪高涨。【原文：Japanese stocks rose for a third day on strengthening market sentiment after US inflation data cemented expectations the Federal Reserve will cut rates next week for the first time this year.】

item.title: 火箭制造商 Avio 寻求 4 亿欧元新资金用于扩张
item.description: 意大利火箭制造商阿维奥公司（Avio SpA）将寻求从股东处筹集多达 4 亿欧元（4.695 亿美元）的新股本，以加强其卫星发射业务。【原文：Italian rocket maker Avio SpA will seek to raise as much as €400 million ($469.5 million) of new equity from its shareholders to strengthen its satellite-launch business.】

item.title: OpenAI 和 Nvidia 首席执行官将宣布英国数据中心投资计划
item.description: 据知情人士透露，OpenAI 和英伟达公司的领导人计划在下周与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普同时前往英国时，承诺支持数十亿美元的英国数据中心投资。【原文：The leaders of OpenAI and Nvidia Corp. plan to pledge support for billions of dollars in UK data center investments when they head to the country next week at the same time as President Donald Trump, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 派拉蒙与华纳的交易将面临监管和融资障碍
item.description: 大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）花了两年时间试图与派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）展开合作，最终以 80 亿美元的价格完成了对这家好莱坞标志性制片厂的收购。【原文：David Ellison spent two years trying to get his arms around Paramount Global before finally sealing an $8 billion takeover of that iconic Hollywood studio.】

item.title: 乔希-卡夫早早大败后结束波士顿市长竞选
item.description: 新英格兰爱国者队（New England Patriots）老板罗伯特-卡夫（Robert Kraft）的儿子乔希-卡夫（Josh Kraft）在本周的初选中惨败给现任市长米歇尔-吴（Michelle Wu），将退出波士顿市长竞选。【原文：Josh Kraft, the son of New England Patriots owner Robert Kraft, is dropping out of Boston’s mayoral race after losing badly to incumbent Michelle Wu in this week’s preliminary election.】

item.title: 如果收益率上升，富达和 Pinebridge 将考虑增持印尼债券
item.description: 富达国际（Fidelity International）和松桥投资公司（Pinebridge Investments）正在权衡对印尼债券的押注，在印尼新任财政部长承诺将预算赤字控制在国内生产总值 3% 的法定限额内之后，他们强调了财政纪律的重要性。【原文：Fidelity International and Pinebridge Investments are weighing bets on Indonesian bonds, emphasizing the importance of fiscal discipline after the nation’s new finance minister pledged to keep the budget deficit within the legal limit of 3% of gross domestic product.】

item.title: 前维珍澳大利亚公司老板赫德里卡获得 3300 万美元赔偿金
item.description: 前维珍澳大利亚控股有限公司（Virgin Australia Holdings Ltd.首席执行官杰恩-赫德里卡（Jayne Hrdlicka）在离开维珍航空公司时获得了 5000 万澳元（3300 万美元）的最终补偿，这笔意外之财让她成为澳大利亚薪酬最高的领导人之一。【原文：Former Virgin Australia Holdings Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Jayne Hrdlicka left the airline with a final package of A$50 million ($33 million), a windfall that makes her one of the country’s best-paid leaders.】

item.title: 秘鲁将主要利率降至 4.25% 的三年最低水平
item.description: 在上个月通货膨胀率意外骤降之后，秘鲁将利率降至 2022 年以来的最低水平。【原文：Peru cut interest rates to the lowest level since 2022 after inflation unexpectedly plunged last month.】

item.title: 廉价人民币融资正吸引更多中国以外的借款人
item.description: 在匈牙利着手建设将汽车厂与西欧新市场连接起来的铁路时，该国正在转向中国融资。【原文：As Hungary embarks on building railways that link car factories to new markets in western Europe, the country is turning to financing in China.】

item.title: 中国经济增长前景黯淡，卖空者瞄准中国海直
item.description: 随着投资者对中国连锁火锅企业长期增长前景的审视，看跌海蒂乐国际控股有限公司的赌注急剧上升。【原文：Bearish wagers on Haidilao International Holding Ltd. have surged as investors scrutinize the Chinese hotpot chain’s long-term growth outlook.】

item.title: 宝马在中国的一家主要经销商预计将在反弹前 "受苦
item.description: 作为宝马汽车公司在中国的主要经销商之一，森那美有限公司（Sime Darby Bhd.【原文：Sime Darby Bhd., one of the main dealerships in China for BMW AG, expects things to get worse before sales of the German luxury vehicles rebound in the cut-throat Chinese auto market.】

item.title: 香港股票 ETF 因人工智能和生物技术热潮而获得创纪录的中国资金
item.description: 从人工智能到生物技术等热门主题促使中国投资者向追踪港股的本地上市交易所交易基金投入了创纪录的大量现金，分析人士认为这一趋势可能会持续下去。【原文：Hot themes from artificial intelligence to biotech have driven Chinese investors to pour record amounts of cash into locally listed exchange-traded funds that track Hong Kong stocks, a trend that analysts say is likely to continue.】

item.title: 美国 CPI 公布后，亚洲将加入全球股市反弹行列：市场综述
item.description: 在劳动力市场降温和美国通胀数据持平为美联储下周降息铺平道路之后，亚洲已准备好加入全球股市反弹的行列。【原文：Asia was primed to join a global equity rally after a cooling labor market and in-line US inflation data clinched a path for the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates next week.】

item.title: 温克艾沃斯的加密货币交易所双子星在首次公开募股中募集 4.25 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，双子座空间站公司在首次公开募股中筹集了 4.25 亿美元，其股票定价高于市场范围，股票数量也有所减少。【原文：Gemini Space Station Inc. raised $425 million in an initial public offering, pricing its stock above a marketed range and shrinking the number of shares, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 银行工会称计划采取行动重新安置被解雇的伊塔乌员工
item.description: 一个代表圣保罗银行员工的工会表示，它将提起集体诉讼，旨在重新安置伊塔乌国民银行控股公司（Itau Unibanco Holding SA）的员工。【原文：A union representing workers at Sao Paulo banks said it will file a collective action aimed at reintegrating Itau Unibanco Holding SA employees who were dismissed on Monday for alleged low productivity while working remotely.】

item.title: 激进投资者 AVI 准备增持日本小型股
item.description: Activist Asset Value Investors Ltd.计划在旗下一个投资信托基金按计划进行合并后获得更多资金，从而增持日本中小型公司的股份。【原文：Activist Asset Value Investors Ltd. plans to add stakes in Japanese small- and mid-cap companies once it gains more firepower from a planned merger of one of its investment trusts.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会动议撤销对尼古拉前首席执行官米尔顿的起诉
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（US Securities and Exchange Commission）已采取行动，撤销对尼古拉公司（Nikola Corp.【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission has moved to drop its case against the former head of Nikola Corp., the once-buzzy electric vehicle startup that has faced a stunning downfall.】

item.title: 澳新银行首席执行官向因裁员而感到恐慌的银行家们发出 "Nunogeddon "警告
item.description: 在短短四个月内，努诺-马托斯（Nuno Matos）拆除了澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）前老板谢恩-埃利奥特（Shayne Elliott）长达十年的遗产。【原文：In just four months, Nuno Matos has dismantled the decade-long legacy of ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.’s former boss Shayne Elliott.】

item.title: 微软与 OpenAI 就营利性变革达成早期协议
item.description: OpenAI与其最大的投资者微软公司（Microsoft Corp.）已就双方的合作结构达成初步协议，此举可能会为这家人工智能初创公司重组为一家更传统的营利性公司的计划铺平道路。【原文：OpenAI and its largest investor, Microsoft Corp., have reached a preliminary agreement about the structure of their partnership, a move that could pave the way for the artificial intelligence startup’s plan to restructure into a more traditional for-profit company.】

item.title: 微软将为内部人工智能模型提供更强大的计算能力
item.description: 微软公司计划扩大其物理基础设施，以训练自己的人工智能模型，希望能与 OpenAI、Anthropic 和其他公司竞争。【原文：Microsoft Corp. plans to expand its physical infrastructure to train its own artificial intelligence models that it hopes will be competitive with OpenAI, Anthropic and other firms.】

item.title: 前两个西格玛量子公司被联邦检察官指控欺诈
item.description: 一名前 Two Sigma Investments 定量研究员被起诉，罪名是他秘密操纵算法投资模型，使其看起来比实际价值更高，目的是提高自己的报酬。【原文：A former Two Sigma Investments quantitative researcher was indicted on charges that he secretly manipulated algorithmic investment models to make them appear more valuable than they were with the goal of boosting his own compensation.】

item.title: 美联储的独立性能经受住唐纳德-特朗普的考验吗？
item.description:
从校园侮辱到试图解雇，特朗普在追求降息的道路上开辟了新天地。这对央行的未来意味着什么？【原文：

From schoolyard insults to an attempted firing, Trump has broken new ground in his pursuit of rate cuts. What does that mean for the future of the central bank?
